LanguageData.AimingDelayFactor.label: aiming time
LanguageData.AimingDelayFactor.description: How long it takes to shoot after choosing a target.
LanguageData.IncomingDamageFactor.label: incoming damage multiplier
LanguageData.IncomingDamageFactor.description: A multiplier on all incoming damage.
LanguageData.MeleeArmorPenetration.label: melee armor penetration
LanguageData.MeleeArmorPenetration.description: Average armor penetration of all attacks in melee combat.\n\nThis stat includes currently used weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeCooldownFactor.label: melee cooldown
LanguageData.MeleeCooldownFactor.description: A multiplier on the time this creature takes to recover after making a melee attack.
LanguageData.MeleeDPS.label: melee DPS
LanguageData.MeleeDPS.description: Average damage per second in melee combat.\n\nThis stat ignores target defenses like dodging and armor.
LanguageData.MeleeDamageFactor.label: melee damage factor
LanguageData.MeleeDamageFactor.description: A multiplier on the amount of melee damage inflicted by this person.
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChance.label: melee dodge chance
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChance.description: Chance to dodge a melee attack that would've otherwise hit.\n\nCharacters will not dodge while aiming or firing a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChance.label: melee hit chance
LanguageData.MeleeHitChance.description: Chance to hit a target in melee.\n\nThe target can still dodge even if we would've hit.
LanguageData.MortarMissRadiusFactor.label: Mortar miss radius multiplier
LanguageData.MortarMissRadiusFactor.description: A multiplier on the miss radius of a mortar used by this person. Smaller numbers means more accurate mortar shells.
LanguageData.PawnTrapSpringChance.label: trap spring chance
LanguageData.PawnTrapSpringChance.description: Chance to spring a trap the character is unaware of.
LanguageData.RangedCooldownFactor.label: ranged cooldown multiplier
LanguageData.RangedCooldownFactor.description: A multiplier on the cooldown between bursts when using a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyFactor_Long.label: accuracy factor (long)
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyFactor_Long.description: A multiplier on accuracy at a distance of 40 cells or more.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyFactor_Medium.label: accuracy factor (medium)
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyFactor_Medium.descriptio: A multiplier on accuracy at a distance of 25 cells.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyFactor_Short.label: accuracy factor (short)
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyFactor_Short.description: A multiplier on accuracy at a distance of 12 cells.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyFactor_Touch.label: accuracy factor (close)
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyFactor_Touch.description: A multiplier on accuracy at a distance of 3 cells or less.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyPawn.label: shooting accuracy
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyPawn.description:
Base chance to not miss per cell of shot distance.

Chance to hit is also affected by many other factors.

A hit chance explanation for any shot can be seen by selecting a shooter and mousing over a target.
LanguageData.StaggerDurationFactor.label: stagger time multiplier
LanguageData.StaggerDurationFactor.description: A multiplier on the duration of the stagger-slowdown that occurs when damage is taken.
